category_intro_localized.en: Our outdoor event series continues! Join Perrine and Château Miraval on July 26th for A Midsummer Night's Soirée featuring food, music and endless Miraval Côtes de Provence Rosé! Tickets now on sale.
category_intro_localized.zh: 我们的户外活动系列继续！ 7月26日加入Perrine和ChâteauMiraval，参加仲夏夜之旅，包括美食，音乐和无尽的MiravalCôtesdeProvenceRosé！门票现已发售。
